entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: `dotnet tool restore` with a `dotnet-tools.json` is broken in .NET 8 RC 2 #35989
  • Add test coverage for minimum roslyn version in APICompat task #35986
  • Re-implement deleted StaticFileHandlerTest tests #35971

Closed

  • SDK resolver failure when an older SDK is also installed #35334
    Discussion
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 get slow build on SDK 7.0.400 #35200
  • CheckForDuplicateItems case sensitive #35693
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816
    Discussion
  • Unable to publish to Alpine image, executable not found or runtime identifier 'linux-musl-x64' not supported #35981
  • "dotnet test" fails to write crash dump #15706
  • Release 7.0.400 breaks Github actions where `dotnet test` works against net462 on non-windows targets #34605
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task package no longer works with older SDKs #35468
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 SDK installed, The message "Manifest package for microsoft.net.sdk.aspire doesn't exist" displays during installing workload. #35921

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #35980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix CodeAnalysis version used by APICompat assemblies #35963
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.1xx
  • Add .gitignore to exclude files generated by test #35940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0036 "Modifiers are not ordered" cleanup #35956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to the svc pool for 7.0.4xx #35948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #35976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #35979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #35978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #35977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #35975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move compatibility tools into common folder #35964
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Update APICompat & GenAPI CodeAnalysis versions #35958
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    Area-WebSDK
  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-8.0.100 as a dependency #35569
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35907
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
